summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The South Dallas Fair Park Opportunity Fund Board is convening for a regular meeting on February 26, 2024, from 6:00 PM to 7:30 PM at Dallas City Hall, Room #6ES, with an option for videoconference participation. The primary purpose of the meeting is to discuss updates and decisions related to the South Dallas Fair Park Opportunity Fund (SDFPOF) and its associated programs.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the January 29, 2024, meeting.
2. Review and approval of the 2023 SDFPOF Annual Report.
3. Updates on three non-profits that qualified for SDFPOF grants.
4. Presentations on fund financials, qualification criteria for economic development loans and grants, and a GIS map related to SDFPOF.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include staff updates on outreach efforts for small business grants and loans, as well as preparations for the April 2024 Human Development Pre-NOFA launch. Additionally, there will be discussions on marketing materials for SDFPOF economic development loans and grants.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking approval for the 2023 SDFPOF Annual Report and will discuss the status of grants awarded to qualifying non-profits. Decisions regarding the outreach strategies for upcoming funding opportunities will also be addressed. Public speakers will have the opportunity to provide input on these matters.
